keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
map h LinkHints.activateMode action=hover
map e LinkHints.activateMode action=focus
map c LinkHints.activateMode action=copy-text
mapkey <a-i> <c-[>
searchEngines:
# Search Engines
###############
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo

# Encyclopedia
###############
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
plato: https://plato.stanford.edu/search/searcher.py?query=%s Stanford Encyclopedia

# Media
###############
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube

# Dictionary
###############
en: https://dictionary.cambridge.org/dictionary/english-chinese-traditional/%s Cambridge en-zh
de: https://de.pons.com/%C3%BCbersetzung/deutsch-englisch/%s Pons de-en
urban: https://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=%s Urban Dictionary

# Resources
###############
gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google Maps

# Misc
###############
aur: https://aur.archlinux.org/packages?O=0&K= ArchLinux AUR
l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...

# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
# az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
